description: Table showing inquests into service deaths in Iraq and Afghanistan a) pre 16 May 2006, b) between 16 May 2006 and 31 March 2007, c) since 1 April 2007, d) Service deaths in Iraq and Afghanistan for which there was no formal inquest hearings, e) Inquests of service personnel and civilians who died in Iraq repatriated via RAF Brize Norton. 40 p.
